basics.name: Timileyin Farayola
basics.label: Backend Developer
basics.summary: I'm an innovative and technically-astute Software Engineer well-versed in analysing user needs and developing software applications to precisely meet diverse needs. Currently seeking out for new opportunities.

work.summary: Freelancing as a Backend Developer on clents' projects.
Developed software applications using technologies like NodeJS, React, Redux, TypeScript and MongoDB. Planned & engineered RESTFul web services to manipulate dynamic datasets.

Collected, defined & translated user requirements into project designs & implementation plans. Developed software applications using NodeJS, JavaScript, React, Redux and PostgreSQL. Worked in an Agile-driven environment to effectively maintain project timelines and utilise available resources. Worked with technologies like Docker, Kubernetes, CircleCI, Bash Scripting & GCP. Implemented unit testing to deliver optimal functionality.

Implemented Server side logic with Java on a software project for managing Students enrolled in online courses on Edx & Coursera to track their progress and interact with other students taking same courses in their locality. Worked with Google App Engine.

education.area: Introduction to Computer Science & Programming Using Python (MOOCs).
education.courses: Object Oriented Programming, Data Structure & Algorithm, Introduction to Python Programming, Logic & Problem Solving.
Object Oriented Programming, Android App Developent, Programming with Java.
Object Oriented Programming, Database Management Systems, Data Structure & Algorithm, Introduction to Java Programming.

project.name: NG USSD Banking App
project.tools: Tools: Flutter, Dart, XCode & Android Studio.
project.summary: This is a cross-platform mobile app that helps you perform banking transactions via various Nigerian banksâ€™ USSD platform without the need to memorise the various USSD codes.

project.name: Dealz Finder Bot
project.tools: Tools: Docker, Python, FastAPI, BeautifulSoup, Selenium WebDriver, Redis, NodeJS, ExpressJS, PostgreSQL, Sequelize, Cron and Heroku Container stack.
project.summary: This is an app that scrapes the two major e-commerce websites in Nigeria to find specific products (deals) that fall within a given price range & notifies users with the link to the product on the e-commerce website.

project.name: US Stock Market Info Bot App
project.tools: Tools: TeleGram API, Facebook Messenger (Graph API), NodeJS, ExpressJS, PostgreSQL, Sequelize, GraphQL, Puppeteer, Twilio, Redis, MemCachier, Cron jobs.
project.summary: A Telegram & Facebook Messenger Chat Bot app that provides users with information on the US Stock Market, Cryptos & Nigeria Stock Market.

project.name: Web Page ScreenShot App
project.tools: Tools: Puppeteer, NodeJS, ExpressJS, HTML, CSS
project.summary: A web application for capturing a web page as screenshot image or as a pdf document.

project.name: Fast Food Order App

Created a web application (boot-camp project) for a fictional food store that allows users to order fast food via the application.
